Articles.Content: I have been testing an escape pod launch system, and on one of these tests I noticed 14 parent ships in orbit, then it occurred to me, perhaps I should put a vessel crew on the parent ships, instead of transferring the two Kerb's to the pod, and ejecting them? 14 debris targets each with a cash value of 100000 credits each, I think the central government will be canceling my budget here soon. Lol
